title: Couple With Heart Man Person Medium Skin Tone Light Skin Tone
alsoKnownAs: Couple With Heart: Person, Man, Medium Skin Tone, Light Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic couple consisting of a person and a man, with the person having a medium skin tone and the man having a light skin tone. The heart signifies love, affection, and partnership.
apple_vendor_description: This Apple emoji depicts a loving couple, with the man rendered in a medium skin tone and the person in a light skin tone, embracing affectionately with a vibrant red heart symbolizing their deep connection. On Apple devices, the figures boast smooth, rounded edges and realistic shading that highlights their forms with a gentle glow. The heart itself is a signature Apple design element, appearing plump and glossy with subtle highlights, conveying pure joy and romantic sentiment in digital conversations.
